Welcome to DevHub

Code. Create. Collaborate.

Join DEVHUB - Coding Club PIEMR, where students master web development through hands-on learning, hackathons, and innovation.

Founded 17 Agustus 2025
PIEMR, Indore
Register NowLearn More
Scroll to explore

Our Mission

Empowering students to excel in web development through collaboration, innovation, and ethical practices

Pemberdayaan Web Development
Untuk memberdayakan anggota kami agar unggul dalam Pengembangan Web dengan membina komunitas pembelajaran, kolaborasi, dan inovasi yang dinamis.
Penguasaan Keterampilan Teknis
Untuk membekali anggota dengan keterampilan penting di HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Django, FastAPI, MongoDB, Express.js, Git, dan GitHub.
Kreativitas & Etika
Untuk menumbuhkan budaya pemecahan masalah kreatif dan pengembangan etis, memastikan anggota kami membangun aplikasi yang berdampak positif pada masyarakat.
Proyek Kolaboratif
Untuk menyelenggarakan Acara, Hackathon, dan Ceramah Ahli, serta memfasilitasi Proyek kolaboratif di mana siswa bekerja sama untuk menciptakan solusi yang berdampak.

Ready to be part of our mission?

Join DevHub Today

Technologies We Master

Learn industry-standard tools and frameworks used by professional developers worldwide

Frontend Development
Fokus pada antarmuka pengguna interaktif menggunakan kerangka kerja modern.
HTMLCSSJavaScriptReact.jsNext.js
Backend & Frameworks
Membangun logika sisi server yang kuat dan skalabel.
DjangoFastAPIExpress.js
Database & Tooling
Manajemen data dan kolaborasi melalui alat pengembangan penting.
MongoDBGitGitHub

Our curriculum is designed to keep pace with industry trends and prepare you for real-world development challenges.

Explore Our Full Curriculum

Why Join DevHub?

Discover the benefits of being part of our thriving coding community

Hands-On Workshops
Learn by doing with practical, project-based workshops led by experienced developers.
Hackathons & Competitions
Participate in exciting hackathons to build real-world solutions and showcase your skills.
Expert Talks
Gain insights from industry professionals and learn about latest trends in web development.
Collaborative Projects
Work in teams on meaningful projects that make a positive impact on society.
Mentorship Program
Get guidance from experienced members and build lasting professional relationships.
Community Support
Join a vibrant community of like-minded developers passionate about learning and growth.

Ready to Launch Your Dev Career?

Join DevHub today and become part of a community dedicated to excellence in web development. Whether you're a beginner or experienced developer, there's a place for you here.
